description.displayText:
Martha is a fantastic nanny. She has been with us since my son was 2 weeks old! And she still works for us part time and I don't want that to ever end! She is very responsible, incredibly caring and punctual. She has a lot of experience in taking care of babies and toddlers, at the same time she is open minded in receiving feedback and guidance on how I would like my baby to be cared for.
For anyone who is looking for a great nanny, I would strongly recommend Martha, she is an amazing nanny who will care for your children like they are family.

description.displayText:
Martha has been taking care of our daughter for more than a year. She took care of our daughter as she is her family. Our daughter misses Martha and she always asks me "is Martha coming today?" 
She learned a lot of good things, knowledge, ABC, numbers, songs and good positive personality from Martha. We had to take our daughter to educational institute that's why Martha stopped working for us. She is a great person and your child is lucky to have Martha as a care giver.
